channel.title: Need help with
channel.description: I just started with php and mySql yesterday but heres my question: How do I make a php page on my 000webhost.com site? I know its a noob question but how good and detailed help is aprieciated (also i dont want help on googleing it becuase i have already googled it so if that is your solution then dont answer )

item.title: Need help with
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Just upload it to your host. If you don’t know the answer to this simple question, you should be wondering whether you should touch your computer again before you read a tutorial on making websites.

Read full topic
